00011 struct SBlat {
00012 
00013   SBlat(string input);
00014   
00015   int match, mismatch, repmatch, Ns, Qgap_count, Qgap_bases, Tgap_count, Tgap_bases;
00016   char strand;
00017   string query_name;
00018   int query_size, query_start, query_end;
00019   string hit_name;
00020   int hit_size, hit_start, hit_end;
00021   int blockCount, blockSizes; 
00022 
00023   // define how these are to be sorted. Sort by biggest match first
00024   bool operator < (const SBlat& b) const { return (match > b.match); }
00025 
00026 };

00028 typedef vector<SBlat> SBlatVec;

00030 struct RepeatMasker {
00031 
00032   RepeatMasker(string input);
00033 
00034   //RepeatMasker(int tsw, string tcontig, string trep_name, string trep_class, 
00035   //           double tdiv, double tdel, double tins, int beg, int end) :
00036   // sw(tsw), contig(tcontig), repeat_name(trep_name), repeat_class(trep_class), perc_div(tdiv), perc_del(tdel), perc_ins(tins), 
00037   // query_begin(beg), query_end(end) {}
00038 
00039   int sw;
00040   string contig;
00041   string repeat_name;
00042   string repeat_class;
00043   
00044   double perc_div;
00045   double perc_del;
00046   double perc_ins;
00047   
00048   int query_begin;
00049   int query_end;
00050 
00051   // define how these are to be sorted. Sort by biggest sw first
00052   bool operator < (const RepeatMasker& rep) const { 
00053     return (sw > rep.sw); 
00054   }
00055 
00056   // print it out
00057   string toString() {
00058     stringstream ss;
00059     ss << "SW: " << sw << " Contig: " << contig << " RepeatName: " << repeat_name << 
00060       " RepeatClass: " << repeat_class << " %Div: " << perc_div << " %Del: " << perc_del << 
00061       " %Ins: " << perc_ins << " QueryBegin: " << query_begin << " QueryEnd: " << query_end;
00062     return ss.str();
00063   }
00064 
00065 };
00066 
00067 typedef vector<RepeatMasker> RepeatMaskerVec;
